message:
Hello Guys
Twitter 1.1 API Quest 

How to get date range tweets from this data-end :
https://api.twitter.com/1.1/search/tweets.json

Because it until and since doesn't work =D.

data.message: Well I need dates not ranges =D.

twitter search api doesn't get you tweets back for this long period. the twitter index only holds tweets from around 6-9 days ago (and not all the tweets for this period either). the only way to get historical twitter data is through another service that is a partner with twitter that provides historical twitter data access like http://gnip.com/
if anyone knows a way to get tweets back until this time, i'd love to know it. because i used to have the same problem. :)

Well you sound reasonable :)), I searched for it for 2 days.
the way i came out with is to use the web advanced search and render it with phantomjs, and let the spider go twitter =D

interestingly, i noticed that the twitter search through the website returns more tweets and for periods of time more than the search api index. but it's still a very small subset of the total number of tweets that is already there (couple hundreds when the actual number may be thousands or tens of thousands)
Yep I noticed that too. sadly the old apis doesn't work anymore :@

I was thinking about doing something else with Twitter and went PhantomJS as well (was playing, never made it to production, yet), good I wasn't completely insane as someone else thought in a similar way. Although I didn't really use PhantomJS directly (used Selenium to talk to it, and when debugging ran it in Chrome instead of PhantomJS to see and debug easily).
